xml.title: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new user
xml.summary: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new the user, hence unable to create a new user in the application
xml.steps_to_reproduce: 1)Login into the Application 2)Navigate to the Users Menu -> New User 3)Filled out all the user information fields 4)Clicked on the ‘Save’ button
xml.expected_result: you should be prompted to a successful message 'New User has been created successfully'
